section.title: vendor catalog management of External Vendor Catalog
section.para: The External Vendor Catalog is designed to help distributors manage not only their own Items but also the potential Items they have access to. These external Items can come from pricing services such as Trade Service (http://www.tradeservice.com)â€•or, if your Vendor provides price sheets, you can also create custom maps to import the Vendor's Items into xTuple ERP.

note.para: To learn more about building your Catalog using Vendor provided Price Sheets, check out the xwdpricesheet package video at xTuple University: http://xtupleuniversity.com/.
